quote_first: It would feel, she realised, altogether too strange to climb into the same bed with a man she hadn’t seen for two years.She noticed the time on the digital alarm clock.
title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig

quote_last: S-line bus proceeding in the direction of Porte de Champerret arrive on that day?”“At 12:38 p.m.”“Were there many people on the aforesaid S-bus?”“Bags of ’em.”“Did you particularly notice any of them?”“An individual who had a very a long neck and a plait round his hat.”
title: Exercises in Style
author: Raymon Queneau
